name: Nfidia Clicker Factory Simulator
description:
Always dreamt of owning a graphic card company, well now you can. Become the #1 graphic card company.

A Clicker Simulator game where you Tap to be the best.

Upgrade your machines and buy factories to make your way through the industry.

Set-up Auto Clicker to relax your fingers

Raise your income with new upgraded GFX

From Nfidia GXT to Nfidia RXT, sell your passion to gamers world wide.

Click Click Click to become a GFX Billionaire...

DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE

Connect with the developer on twitter @himzy_ for feedback and updates
